alert.note: Alert for Albany; Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 11:59AM EST until December 19 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at Albany. * WHEN...From late tonight to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...at 12.0 feet, Ramps of Interstate 787, underpass of Broadway near Madison Ave and Colonie Street, and the parking lot of the Village One apartments in Menands are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EST Monday the stage was 7.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to flood stage early Tuesday morning with a maximum value of 12.3 feet late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Albany Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Mon 11 am: 7.5 Forecast: Mon 12 pm 6.6 Mon 6 pm 7.5 Tue 12 am 10.1 Tue 6 am 11.5 Tue 12 pm 12.2 Tue 6 pm 10.8 Wed 12 am 9.7 Wed 6 am 6.7 Wed 12 pm 6.9 Wed 6 pm 4.0 Thu 12 am 5.5 Thu 6 am 2.6 &&
